SearchEngine.API

Class RequestHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • SearchEngine.API.RequestHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    public class RequestHandler
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    The class listen on PATH "/search", and is responsible for handling user search request.
    See Also:

      • parseNodes

        private Node parseNodes(java.lang.String q)
        Each node represent an AND/OR group, with left and right child. Parsing and processing will be done recursively. E.g. (A OR B), ((A OR B) AND C) ...etc.
        Parameters:
        q - - String representing the tree
        Returns:
        Root node of the tree

      • nodeIsTrue

        private int nodeIsTrue(Node n,
                       java.util.List<java.lang.String> keywords,
                       java.lang.String title,
                       int weight)
        Check if the page match with the tree
        Parameters:
        n - - Root node of the tree
        keywords - - keywords of the page
        title - - title of the page
        weight - - the current weight of the page
        Returns:
        weight, 0 - no match, >0 - match

      • containsIgnorecase

        private int containsIgnorecase(java.lang.String needle,
                               java.util.List<java.lang.String> haystack,
                               java.lang.String title)
        Search for match using a keyword in a node.
        Parameters:
        needle - - the keyword
        haystack - - the keywords of the page to perform searching
        title - - title of the page
        Returns:
        weight, 0 - no match, >0 - match
